title: AI Cartoonizer - Turn Any Photo into Cartoon Art Instantly

hero.heading: Convert Photos into Cartoon Art
hero.description: Upload your image and let our AI turn it into cartoon, anime, Pixar-style, or comic-style artwork instantly.

removePhoto.heading: Turn Your Photo Into a Cartoon

prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Pixar style, anime portrait, comic book effect, 3D cartoon character...

examples.heading: Before & After Examples
examples.description: See how AI Cartoonizer transforms ordinary photos into stunning cartoon artwork.

items.title: Anime Style
items.description: Turn your portrait into a vibrant anime character

items.title: Pixar 3D Style
items.description: Transform your face into a cute 3D cartoon character

features.heading: Why Choose AI Cartoonizer?
features.description: Create high-quality cartoon art with just one click—no design skills needed.

items.title: Instant Results
items.description: Our AI generates cartoon images in seconds. No waiting, no queues.

items.title: Beginner Friendly
items.description: Just upload a photo and choose your style. The AI handles everything automatically.

items.title: Privacy First
items.description: Your images never leave your device—processing is done securely in your browser.

howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Turn your photo into a cartoon in three simple steps

items.title: Upload Image
items.description: Drag and drop, or upload from your device. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.title: Choose a Cartoon Style
items.description: Select from anime, comic, Pixar 3D, hand-drawn, or realistic cartoon styles.

items.title: Download Your Cartoon
items.description: Preview side-by-side and download your cartoon image in high resolution.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: See what people are saying about AI Cartoonizer

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.comment: My friends love the Pixar-style portrait! This tool is super fun and unbelievably easy to use.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.comment: As an illustrator, this saves me so much time creating cartoon concepts. The anime mode is amazing.

items.name: Emily Carter
items.comment: Love the privacy—my photos never upload anywhere. The cartoon quality is incredible!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about AI Cartoonizer

items.title: What types of cartoon styles are supported?
items.description: AI Cartoonizer supports anime style, Pixar-like 3D, comic book, watercolor cartoon, sketch cartoon, and semi-realistic cartoon transformations.

items.title: Is AI Cartoonizer free?
items.description: Yes! You can generate cartoon images for free with daily credits. You can earn additional credits or upgrade for unlimited usage.

items.title: Can I use these cartoon images commercially?
items.description: Users with any paid plan can use generated artwork for commercial projects. Free-plan users are limited to personal use only.

items.title: How is my privacy protected?
items.description: All processing is done locally in your browser using WebAssembly. Images are never uploaded or stored on a server.

footer.heading: Ready to Cartoonize Your Photo?
footer.description: Try AI Cartoonizer now and turn your photos into stunning cartoon artwork.
